languages.text: {n}Капеллан пожимает плечами.{/n} "Законная наследница распорядиться им, как видите, не может, а прочие претенденты вашими стараниями более ни на что не претендуют. Не хотите ли присвоить это добро? Денз, думаю, был бы только рад. Ему нравились люди с характером, как вы".

{n}Chaplain shrugs.{/n} "The rightful heir can't exactly make use of it, as you can see, and, thanks to your hard work, the other claimants have no more claims to lay. Want to take the fortune for yourself? I think Denz would say you're welcome to it. He liked people like you — people with gumption."
languages.original_text: {n}Капеллан пожимает плечами.{/n} "Законная наследница распорядиться им, как видите, не может, а прочие претенденты вашими стараниями более ни на что не претендуют. Не хотите ли присвоить это добро? Денз, думаю, был бы только рад. Ему нравились люди с характером, как вы".

traits.locale_text: {n}Chaplain shrugs.{/n} "The rightful heir can't exactly make use of it, as you can see, and, thanks to your hard work, the other claimants have no more claims to lay. Want to take the fortune for yourself? I'd say Denz would be perfectly happy with it. He liked people of character such as yourself."

{n}Chaplain shrugs.{/n} "The rightful heir can't exactly make use of it, as you can see, and, thanks to your hard work, the other claimants have no more claims to lay. Want to take the fortune for yourself? I'd say Denz would be perfectly happy with it. He liked people of character such as yourself."

{n}Chaplain shrugs.{/n} "The rightful heir can't exactly make use of it, as you can see, and, thanks to your hard work, the other claimants have no more claims to lay. Want to take the fortune for yourself? I'd say Denz would be perfectly happy with it. He liked people like you — people with gumption."

{n}Chaplain shrugs.{/n} "The rightful heir can't exactly make use of it, as you can see, and, thanks to your hard work, the other claimants have no more claims to lay. Want to take the fortune for yourself? I'd say Denz would be perfectly happy with it. He liked people like you — people with gumption."

{n}Chaplain shrugs.{/n} "The rightful heir can't exactly make use of it, as you can see, and, thanks to your hard work, the other claimants have no more claims to lay. Want to take the fortune for yourself? I think Denz would say you're welcome to it. He liked people like you — people with gumption."

languages.text: {n}牧师耸了耸肩。{/n}“如你所见，遗产合法的继承人无法真正地利用这笔遗产。而且，由于你的不懈努力，其他继承人也没法再继承遗产了。你打算把这笔财富据为己有吗？我觉得如果丹兹还活着，他一定很乐意给你。他喜欢你这种有魄力的人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain shrugs.{/n} "The rightful heir can't exactly make use of it, as you can see, and, thanks to your hard work, the other claimants have no more claims to lay. Want to take the fortune for yourself? I think Denz would say you're welcome to it. He liked people like you — people with gumption."

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师耸了耸肩。{/n}“如你所见，遗产合法的继承人无法真正地利用这笔遗产。而且，由于你的不懈努力，其他继承人也没法再继承遗产了。你打算把这笔财富据为己有吗？我觉得如果丹兹还活着，他一定很乐意给你。他喜欢你这种有魄力的人。”

languages.text: {n}El capellán se encoge de hombros.{/n} «Como puede ver, la heredera legítima no está en posición de aprovecharla y, gracias a su duro trabajo, los otros solicitantes no pueden presentar reclamaciones. ¿Quiere quedarse la fortuna? Creo que a Denz le parecería bien. Le gustaba la gente como usted. Gente con agallas».
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain shrugs.{/n} "The rightful heir can't exactly make use of it, as you can see, and, thanks to your hard work, the other claimants have no more claims to lay. Want to take the fortune for yourself? I think Denz would say you're welcome to it. He liked people like you — people with gumption."

traits.locale_text: {n}El capellán se encoge de hombros.{/n} «Como puede ver, la heredera legítima no está en posición de aprovecharla y, gracias a su duro trabajo, los otros solicitantes no pueden presentar reclamaciones. ¿Quiere quedarse la fortuna? Creo que a Denz le parecería bien. Le gustaba la gente como usted. Gente con agallas».

languages.text: {n}教戒官は肩をすくめた。{/n}「ご覧のとおり、正式な相続者が受け取ったところでどうにもできませんし、あなたの労力のおかげで他の相続人も権利を主張することができません。あなたが受け取ったらどうです？デンツも歓迎するでしょう。あなたのように度胸のある人が好きでしたから」
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain shrugs.{/n} "The rightful heir can't exactly make use of it, as you can see, and, thanks to your hard work, the other claimants have no more claims to lay. Want to take the fortune for yourself? I think Denz would say you're welcome to it. He liked people like you — people with gumption."

traits.locale_text: {n}教戒官は肩をすくめた。{/n}「ご覧のとおり、正式な相続者が受け取ったところでどうにもできませんし、あなたの労力のおかげで他の相続人も権利を主張することができません。あなたが受け取ったらどうです？デンツも歓迎するでしょう。あなたのように度胸のある人が好きでしたから」

languages.text: {n}Ordenspriester zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Die rechtmäßige Erbin hat keine Verwendung dafür, wie Ihr seht, und die übrigen Anwärter sind dank Eurer harten Arbeit nicht mehr in der Lage, irgendetwas zu beanspruchen. Wollt Ihr das Vermögen nicht selbst in Besitz nehmen? Denz würde es bestimmt nicht stören. Er mochte Leute wie Euch – Leute mit Mumm und Grips."
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain shrugs.{/n} "The rightful heir can't exactly make use of it, as you can see, and, thanks to your hard work, the other claimants have no more claims to lay. Want to take the fortune for yourself? I think Denz would say you're welcome to it. He liked people like you — people with gumption."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ordenspriester zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Die rechtmäßige Erbin hat keine Verwendung dafür, wie Ihr seht, und die übrigen Anwärter sind dank Eurer harten Arbeit nicht mehr in der Lage, irgendetwas zu beanspruchen. Wollt Ihr das Vermögen nicht selbst in Besitz nehmen? Denz würde es bestimmt nicht stören. Er mochte Leute wie Euch – Leute mit Mumm und Grips."

languages.text: {n}Chapelain hausse les épaules.{/n} « Comme vous pouvez le voir, l'héritière légitime n'en aurait pas la moindre utilité, et, grâce à vous, les éventuels prétendants ne peuvent plus prétendre à grand-chose. Vous pourriez très bien vous emparer de cette fortune. Je ne pense pas que Denz y verrait la moindre objection. Il appréciait généralement les gens de votre trempe. »
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain shrugs.{/n} "The rightful heir can't exactly make use of it, as you can see, and, thanks to your hard work, the other claimants have no more claims to lay. Want to take the fortune for yourself? I think Denz would say you're welcome to it. He liked people like you — people with gumption."

traits.locale_text: {n}Chapelain hausse les épaules.{/n} « Comme vous pouvez le voir, l'héritière légitime n'en aurait pas la moindre utilité, et, grâce à vous, les éventuels prétendants ne peuvent plus prétendre à grand-chose. Vous pourriez très bien vous emparer de cette fortune. Je ne pense pas que Denz y verrait la moindre objection. Il appréciait généralement les gens de votre trempe. »

languages.text: {n}Papaz omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Gördüğünüz üzere meşru vâris mirastan faydalanamaz. Diğer talipler de yoğun çabalarınız sonucunda mirasta hak iddia edemez duruma geldi. Mirası siz almak ister misiniz? Bence Denz'in buna bir itirazı olmazdı. Sizin gibi girişken insanları severdi."
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain shrugs.{/n} "The rightful heir can't exactly make use of it, as you can see, and, thanks to your hard work, the other claimants have no more claims to lay. Want to take the fortune for yourself? I think Denz would say you're welcome to it. He liked people like you — people with gumption."

traits.locale_text: {n}Papaz omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Gördüğünüz üzere yoğun çabalarınız sonucunda meşru vâris ve diğer taliplerin başka bir talepleri yok. Mirası siz almak ister misiniz? Bence Denz'in buna bir itirazı olmazdı. Sizin gibi girişken insanları severdi."
